query:
SELECT g.id, g.userId, u.name, u.email, COUNT(gl.lojaId) as num_lojas 
FROM gestores g 
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id 
LEFT JOIN gestor_lojas gl ON g.id = gl.gestorId 
GROUP BY g.id, g.userId, u.name, u.email
HAVING num_lojas > 0
ORDER BY num_lojas DESC
LIMIT 5;
